column4: of course Ext3 can be used in Karmic, but better off using Ext4 :)
yea, well im using ext4 in jaunty so not a problem for me :p
yes, i find the best way is if people have a friend that knows what they are doing help them at first, but mainly help them think about solving problems themselves
yeah that kind of thing, tends to be a good way to do it
